title: 爱捣鼓的小水木的博客
subTitle: 一个等着裁员的java程序猿，每天无所事事，只想搞钱，喜欢钻研各种使用的技能，讨厌天天做工作上的项目，对自己毫无实用价值。
style:
<style>
  body {
    font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif;
    background: linear-gradient(to right, #43c6ac, #f8ffae, #f0f2f0);
    color: #333;
  }
  .post {
    background-color: #fff;
    border-radius: 12px;
    box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
    padding: 24px;
    margin: 24px auto;
    max-width: 800px;
  }
  .post-title {
    color: #333;
    font-size: 28px;
    font-weight: 600;
  }
  .post-content {
    font-size: 18px;
    line-height: 1.6;
  }
  .post-meta {
    color: #888;
    font-size: 14px;
    margin-top: 16px;
  }
  .post-footer {
    background-color: #f5f5f5;
    border-radius: 12px;
    padding: 16px;
    margin-top: 24px;
    text-align: right;
  }
  .post-footer a {
    color: #00bcd4;
    text-decoration: none;
  }
  .post-footer a:hover {
    text-decoration: underline;
  }
  @media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) {
    body {
      background: linear-gradient(to right, #373b44, #4286f4);
      color: #f5f5f5;
    }
    .post {
      background-color: #1e1e2f;
    }
    .post-title {
      color: #f5f5f5;
    }
    .post-content {
      color: #c0c0c0;
    }
    .post-meta {
      color: #a0a0a0;
    }
    .post-footer {
      background-color: #2b2b3c;
    }
    .post-footer a {
      color: #00bcd4;
    }
  }
</style>
head: <meta name='viewport' content='width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0'/>

    }

</style>
